text: Bennie Muller (14 August 1938 â€“ 17 January 2024) was a Dutch professional footballer who played as a midfielder. He played for the Netherlands national team from 1960 to 1968. Muller died on 17 January 2024, at the age of 85. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Footballers from Amsterdam
